articles.author: Kostya Manenkov, Seth Borenstein, Mike Corder
articles.title: Three scientists at US universities win Nobel Prize in physics for advancing quantum technology - AP News
articles.description: Three scientists have won the Nobel Prize in physics for research on the strange behavior of subatomic particles called quantum tunneling. It enabled the ultra-sensitive measurements achieved by MRI machines and laid the groundwork for better cellphones and f…
articles.content: STOCKHOLM (AP) Three scientists won the Nobel Prize in physics Tuesday for research on the strange behavior of subatomic particles called quantum tunneling that enabled the ultra-sensitive measuremen… [+7031 chars]

articles.author: Jonathan Lambert
articles.title: Babies take a lesson from soldiers in the war against malaria - NPR
articles.description: Inspired by a military strategy to ward off disease-carrying mosquitoes, researchers see if the technique will help cut malaria infections in little ones.
articles.content:
Babies may soon join soldiers in the fight to ward off malaria.
For years, the U.S. military has treated uniforms with insecticide to repel mosquitoes and the malaria they can transmit. Ross Boyce
… [+3335 chars]
